title: Sheep in wood
brief_description: The film presents Jacques Hnizodvsky wroking in his studio on a woodcut of two rams locked in combat. Uses close-up photography to show each step in the process of making a woodcut, from preliminary setches to the artist’s proof. There is no narration.
